comprehensive_overview: MuJoCo is a physics engine for detailed, efficient and accurate simulation of complex dynamical systems. It is designed for high-fidelity modeling and simulation of computational and robotic systems in various domains.
core_features:
1. Fast and efficient physics simulation
2. Support for complex dynamical systems
3. High-fidelity modeling capabilities
4. Integration with various domains such as robotics and computational systems
5. Advanced control algorithms
6. Real-time simulation capabilities
